C

COMPLETED - Static variable in interface io.customerly.Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss
 
configure(String) - Method in class io.customerly.Customerly
Call this method to configure the SDK indicating the Customerly App ID before accessing it.
configure(String, int) - Method in class io.customerly.Customerly
Call this method to configure the SDK indicating the Customerly App ID before accessing it.
Customerly - Class in io.customerly
The singleton representing the Customerly SDK
Customerly.Callback - Interface in io.customerly
 
Customerly.Callback.Failure - Interface in io.customerly
Implement this interface to obtain async failure response from Customerly.update(Callback.Success, Callback.Failure), Customerly.registerUser(String, String, String, Callback.Success, Callback.Failure), Customerly.registerUser(String, String, String, JSONObject,Callback.Success, Callback.Failure) or Customerly.setAttributes(JSONObject, Callback.Success, Callback.Failure)
Customerly.Callback.Success - Interface in io.customerly
Implement this interface to obtain async success response from Customerly.update(Callback.Success, Callback.Failure), Customerly.registerUser(String, String, String, Callback.Success, Callback.Failure), Customerly.registerUser(String, String, String, JSONObject,Callback.Success, Callback.Failure) or Customerly.setAttributes(JSONObject, Callback.Success, Callback.Failure)
Customerly.HtmlMessage - Class in io.customerly
A class representing a SpannableStringBuilder with a method Customerly.HtmlMessage.toPlainTextString() that convert the formatted text to a plain string
Customerly.RealTimeMessagesListener - Interface in io.customerly
Implement this interface to register a listener for incoming real time chat messages with Customerly.realTimeMessages(RealTimeMessagesListener).
Customerly.SurveyListener - Interface in io.customerly
 
Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss - Interface in io.customerly
Implement this interface to obtain async event of the disposing of a Survey Dialog started with Customerly.openSurvey(FragmentManager, SurveyListener.OnShow, SurveyListener.OnDismiss)
Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss.DismissMode - Annotation Type in io.customerly
Indicates the reason of the disposing of the Survey
Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss.COMPLETED - survey closed without invalidation (tap out of alert) Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss.REJECTED - survey closed after that user completed it (user closed survey in "thank you message" step) Customerly.SurveyListener.OnDismiss.POSTPONED - survey closed and reject (user closed survey before "thank you message" step)
Customerly.SurveyListener.OnShow - Interface in io.customerly
Implement this interface to obtain async event of the effective displaying of a Survey Dialog started with Customerly.openSurvey(FragmentManager, SurveyListener.OnShow, SurveyListener.OnDismiss)
